mapper.select: select id, username, password, name, gender, role, phone, avatar, email, department from tb_employee where id NOT IN (select employee_id from tb_quit where delete_status = '离职') and username = #{username} and password = #{password};
mapper.update: update tb_employee set avatar = #{avatar}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select id, username, password, name, gender, role, phone, avatar, email, department from tb_employee where id = #{employeeId};
mapper.insert: insert into tb_leave (employee_id, name, leave_type, start_date, end_date, reason, leave_status) values (#{employeeId},#{name},#{leaveType},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{reason},#{leaveStatus});
insert into tb_quit (employee_id, quit_reason, quit_status) values (#{employeeId},#{quitReason},#{quitStatus});
insert into tb_score (employee_id, name, train_id, score) values (#{employeeId},#{name},#{trainId},#{score});
mapper.select: select title, content, writer, create_time from tb_announcement order by create_time desc limit #{begin},#{size};
